ingredients: 1/2 green bell pepper, seeded, deribbed and &nbsp cut into 1/2-inch squares
1/2 red bell pepper, seeded, deribbed and cut &nbsp into 1/2-inch squares
6 oz. smoked ham or Canadian bacon, cut into &nbsp 1/2-inch dice
Salt and freshly ground white pepper, to taste
Salt and freshly ground white pepper, to taste
1 Tbs. finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
